data.title: Chronology of events in Algeria (1954–1962)
data.meta_description: On 1 November 1954, the uprising in the Aurès mountains marks the beginning of the Algerian War. On 1 June 1958, General de Gaulle returns to power. On 18 March 1962, the Evian Accords mark the end of the war. On 3 July 1962, France recognises Algeria’s independence.
data.text:
Source: CVCE.
